Summary: Multiple orange lights hovering in the sky in Queens NY.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around July 27th 2012
divs: sighting detailson or about 11pm on friday night 7\27\12. i noticed what appeared to be 3 orange lights in the sky. at first i thought they were airplanes but i looked around and noticed some airplanes (i leave near laguardia airport ny) they did not compare. the 3 lights then turned into 4, then 5 and finally 6. by this many other people had noticed and began looking on also in shock. some lights appeared to pass others in height & distance and then came back to each other. this lasted for about 15 minutes when the lights totally faded out. it was very spooky and freaked us all out.
